fields.message: Note: these settings apply to all shop elements of your website. You can override some global setting for individual shop pages.

fields.label: Product items per page
fields.name: global_woocommerce_products_on_page
fields.instructions: Choose the number of product items per page

fields.label: Product items per row
fields.name: global_woocommerce_products_in_row
fields.instructions: Choose the number of product items per row

fields.label: Pagination
fields.name: global_woocommerce_pagination_type
fields.instructions: Choose pagination type for shop page

fields.label: Pagination position
fields.name: global_woocommerce_pagination_position
fields.instructions: Choose pagination position for shop page

fields.label: Breadcrumbs visibility
fields.name: global_woocommerce_page_show_breadcrumbs
fields.instructions: Show breadcrumbs section on shop pages?

fields.label: Breadcrumbs slug
fields.name: global_woocommerce_breadcrumbs_slug
fields.instructions: Enter custom text for breadcrumbs slug

fields.label: Content wrapper
fields.name: global_woocommerce_page_is_wrapped
fields.instructions: Add page content wrapper to shop pages?

fields.label: Boxed page layout
fields.name: global_woocommerce_use_boxed_wrapper
fields.instructions: Wrap Shop pages in boxed container

fields.label: Background type
fields.name: global_woocommerce_page_background_type
fields.instructions: Choose background type for shop pages

fields.label: Background repeat
fields.name: global_woocommerce_page_background_repeat
fields.instructions: Choose repeat type for background image

fields.label: Background attachment
fields.name: global_woocommerce_page_background_is_attached
fields.instructions: Fix background image for shop pages

fields.label: Background color
fields.name: global_woocommerce_page_background_color
fields.instructions: Choose background color for shop pages

fields.label: Sidebar
fields.name: global_woocommerce_sidebar
fields.instructions: Choose sidebar position for shop pages

fields.label: Blank spacer under header
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_add_cap
fields.instructions: We recommend use this setting for transparent and fixed header navigation

fields.label: Sticky header
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_menu_fixed
fields.instructions: Enable sticky header, when you scrolling the page

fields.label: Menu type
fields.name: global_woocommerce_menu_type
fields.instructions: Choose menu type for shop pages

fields.label: Visibility
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_menu_add_contacts_bar
fields.instructions: Show subheader bar on shop pages?

fields.label: Subheader styles
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_menu_contacts_bar_style
fields.instructions: Choose subheader style for shop pages

fields.label: Visibility
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_use_hero
fields.instructions: Hide header title from shop pages?

fields.label: Fullscreen height
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_height_fullscreen
fields.instructions: Enable fullscreen height for header title?

fields.label: Background type
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_title_background_type
fields.instructions: Choose background type for header title

fields.label: Background image
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_background_image
fields.instructions: Upload background image for header title

fields.label: Background overlay
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_use_overlay
fields.instructions: Add colored overlay over background image?

fields.label: Typography settings
fields.name: global_woocommerce_page_typography_settings
fields.instructions: Set up typography for header title

fields.label: Title settings
fields.name: global_woocommerce_header_title_typo
fields.instructions: Set up typograhy for hero titles

fields.label: Background repeat
fields.name: global_woocommerce_footer_background_repeat
fields.instructions: Choose repeat type for background image

fields.name: global_woocommerce_footer_is_sticky

fields.name: global_woocommerce_footer_show_copyright_section
